title: 148862883.what Do You Do In The First Ten Minutes
excerpt: Of your morning? Of your workday? Of your commute to work?

children.text: Of your morning? Of your workday? Of your commute to work?
Of your lunch break? End of day break? Or when you get back home?
What you do first sets the agenda. It sets the cue that triggers the habit.
The first ten minutes are what make the habit count.
